DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare oxygen consumption energy expenditure spontaneous breathe trial .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Oxygen Consumption Energy Expenditure During Spontaneous Breathing Trial .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients go submit 2 spontaneous breathe trial ( Automatic tube compensation plus continuous positive airway pressure continuous positive airway pressure without automatic tube compensation . The oxygen consumption energy expenditure go measure spontaneous breathe trial indirect calorimetry .
DOC.criteria: IMPROVEMENT OR RESOLUTION OF THE UNDERLYING CAUSE OF DISEASE INTUBATED PATIENTS > 24h PaO2 GREATER THAN 60 mmHg WITH FiO2 LESS THAN 40 % PEEP=5 cmH2O CARDIOVASCULAR INSTABILITY FEBRILE OR HYPOTHERMIA CHEST DRAINAGE RESPIRATORY RATE/TIDAL VOLUME RATIO GREATER THAN 105 PREGNANCY FAIL IN THE SPONTANEOUS BREATHING TRIAL LEAKS IN THE CIRCUIT AGITATION NOT ACCEPT PARTICIPATE IN THE STUDY
